languages.text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.
languages.original_text: Ксеносы, вторгнувшиеся в Простор Коронус — друкари, разновидность эльдаров. Эти беспощадные головорезы хорошо известны обитателям региона, однако в последнее время их активность резко увеличилась.

traits.locale_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

languages.text: Ксеносы, вторгнувшиеся в Простор Коронус — друкари, разновидность эльдаров. Эти беспощадные головорезы хорошо известны обитателям региона, однако в последнее время их активность резко увеличилась.
入侵科罗努斯扩区的异形是黑暗灵族，是艾达灵族其中一个分支。这群冷酷无情的杀手常常会造访这片星区，但最近一段时间内，他们袭击的频率却变得极其频繁。
languages.original_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

traits.locale_text: 入侵科罗努斯扩区的异形是黑暗灵族，是艾达灵族其中一个分支。这群冷酷无情的杀手常常会造访这片星区，但最近一段时间内，他们袭击的频率却变得极其频繁。

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスに侵入した異種族は、アエルダリの一種であるデュカーリだ。この無慈悲な殺人者はこの地域の住民によく知られているにもかかわらず、このところ襲撃が急激に増加している。
languages.original_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスに侵入した異種族は、アエルダリの一種であるデュカーリだ。この無慈悲な殺人者はこの地域の住民によく知られているにもかかわらず、このところ襲撃が急激に増加している。

languages.text: Los xenos que han invadido la Extensión de Koronus son los Drukhari, un tipo de Aeldari. Estos asesinos despiadados son conocidos por los habitantes de la región, pero últimamente sus ataques se han intensificado.
languages.original_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

traits.locale_text: Los xenos que han invadido la Extensión de Koronus son los Drukhari, un tipo de Aeldari. Estos asesinos despiadados son conocidos por los habitantes de la región, pero últimamente sus ataques se han intensificado.

languages.text: Die in die Koronus-Ausdehnung eingefallenen Xenos sind Drukhari, eine Untergruppe der Aeldari. Diese gnadenlosen Killer sind den Bewohnern der Region wohlbekannt, aber ihre Angriffe haben in jüngster Zeit deutlich zugenommen.
languages.original_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

traits.locale_text: Die in die Koronus-Ausdehnung eingefallenen Xenos sind Drukhari, eine Untergruppe der Aeldari. Diese gnadenlosen Killer sind den Bewohnern der Region wohlbekannt, aber ihre Angriffe haben in jüngster Zeit deutlich zugenommen.

languages.text: Les xénos qui ont envahi les Étendues de Koronus sont des Drukharis, un type d'Aeldaris. Ces tueurs impitoyables sont bien connus des habitants de la région, mais leurs attaques se sont multipliées ces derniers temps.
languages.original_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

traits.locale_text: Les xénos qui ont envahi les Étendues de Koronus sont des Drukharis, un type d'Aeldaris. Ces tueurs impitoyables sont bien connus des habitants de la région, mais leurs attaques se sont multipliées ces derniers temps.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği'ni istila eden zenolar, bir Aeldari türü olan Drukharilermiş. Bölge halkı, bu acımasız katilleri gayet iyi tanıyor. Saldırılarıysa son zamanlarda keskin bir artış gösterdi.
languages.original_text: The xenos who have invaded the Koronus Expanse are Drukhari, a type of Aeldari. These merciless killers are well known to the inhabitants of the region, but their attacks have sharply increased in recent times.

traits.locale_text: Koronus Enginliği'ni istila eden zenolar, bir Aeldari tipi olan Drukhari. Bölge halkı bu acımasız katilleri gayet iyi tanıyor ancak saldırıları son zamanlarda keskin bir artış gösterdi.
